txt.en: Armacar can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Armacar.
Estenan can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Estenan.
Tulcandur can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Tulcandur.
'I am ready to spar, my friend!'
'Have you come to train? Good, I could use someone like you.'
'You have handled yourself well against eight of the soldiers under my command.'
Celuher can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Celuher.
Faratúr can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Faratúr.
Hallatan can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Hallatan.
Ambassion can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Ambassion.
Ostondil can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should spar with Ostondil.
Hildvar, daughter of Huneric Hundred-slayer, has been tasked with training the soldiers before the Storm of Wrath strikes.

'Have you come to train? Good, I could use someone like you: someone who has seen battle recently! The men who survived the fighting against the Ghâzab Bôron are too exhausted from the pitched retreat to even stand, and most of the soldiers we found here at Díngarth are unfit to take to the battlefield! If they cannot fight in a skirmish upon the Corpse-fields, how can they hope to survive the coming of the Storm of Wrath?\n\n'Spar with these soldiers and teach them the techniques that have allowed you to survive upon the battlefield. I will watch and give you some recommendations after you have finished sparring. After all, I have seen battle with Huneric, Lord of the Thíuda, and I have picked up some of his techniques!'
'I have killed ten Orcs! How many have you bested?'
'Go easy on me. I just recovered from an injury.'
'I am happy to spar with you, friend!'

'You handled yourself well against eight of the soldiers under my command. It is important to anticipate your enemies' actions before they happen; otherwise you will always be reacting, and not setting the pace of the combat. When you know your enemy well, you can counter their blow before they even make the attack!\n\n'These are the words of my father, and I have seen the truth in them for myself. Heed them well and you will never know defeat!'
'I am in need of the practice. I hope to learn much under the command of Hildvar.'
Hildvar can be found in Díngarth.\n\nYou should talk to Hildvar.
'I would rather rest than spar, but Hildvar is looking this way! I suppose we should begin.'
'I have not seen combat in quite some time. Prepare yourself!'
'Let me see your skills. I am a quick learner!'
